content: a beautiful halloween themed crochet collar inspired by cobwebs this pattern uses a 4mm hook and dk weight cotton yarn held together with some sparkle thread this pattern creates a crochet collar approx 16 with ties patten includes alternative yarn suggestions as well as instructions on how to adapt the pattern for different sizes a photo tutorial is also available written in uk terms this pattern is available for free on my blog video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=9xiuvqwddwu
